transcript: all just turned as once, informed a line as long as a California coast and started swimming this way. They didn't make a decision, they didn't have a vote or anything, no one sent them an invitation or a map, they just started swimming as if that's the only thing that matters.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: ...like and they all just turned at once and formed a line as long as the California coast and started swimming this way.  They didn't, you know, they didn't make a decision, they didn't, you know, have boats or anything.  No one sent them an invitation or a map, they just started swimming as if that's the only thing that matters.
